info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 24 at 10:14AM CDT until June 28 at 10:37PM CDT by NWS La Crosse WI
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Wisconsin...
Kickapoo River at Gays Mills affecting Crawford County.
Kickapoo River at Readstown affecting Vernon County.
Kickapoo River at Viola affecting Vernon and Richland Counties.
Kickapoo River at Soldiers Grove affecting Crawford County.
.This River Flood Watch is based on a forecast of 3 to 3.5 inches of rainfall between now and Friday.
* WHAT...Flooding is possible.
* WHERE...Kickapoo River at Viola.
* WHEN...From Friday morning to late Saturday evening.
* IMPACTS...At 14.5 feet, Two roads north of Viola may be under water. Water may be over Highway 131, 3 miles north of Viola, near Ski Hill Road, and also over Simmons Flat Road about a mile north of town.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Friday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding.
Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse.
The next statement will be issued this evening at 1015 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO LATE SATURDAY EVENING
